name: get-companies
description:
Returns the list of company accounts that your API credential has access to. The list is grouped into pages as defined by the query parameters.

To make this request, your API credential must have the following [roles](https://docs.adyen.com/development-resources/api-credentials#api-permissions):

* Management APIâ€”Account read

pageNumber.description: The number of the page to fetch.

pageSize.description: The number of items to have on a page, maximum 100. The default is 10 items on a page.

**data**: The list of companies.
**itemsTotal**: Total number of items.
**pagesTotal**: Total number of pages.
